name: Bristleback
skill: Barrroom Brawler Reactive ability Modify Bristleback with +2 armor after a hero blocking it dies.

name: Crystal Maiden
skill: Arcane Aura Continuous effect Return 2 mana for every spell cast.

name: Legion Commander
skill: Moment of Courage Continuous effect Retaliate 2.

name: Luna
skill: Lucent Beam Reactive ability Before the action phase, deal 1 piercing damage to a random enemy and add a charge to each Eclipse card in your hand or deck.

name: Lycan
skill: Feral Impulse Continuous effect Lycan's allied neighbours have +2 attack.

name: Phantom Assassin
skill: Efficient Killer Continuous effect Phantom Assassin deals +4 damage when attacking a hero.

name: Pugna
skill: Nether Blast Active ability Condemn a random enemy improvement.

name: Rix
skill: Relentless Rebel Continuous effect Rapid Deployment.

name: Sorla Khan
skill: Warmonger Continuous effect Solra Khan deals +4 damage when attacking a tower.

name: Zeus
skill: Static Field Reactive ability Deal 1 piercing damage to Zeus's enemy neighbors after you play a blue spell.

name: Emissary of the Quorum
skill: Mysterious Benefactor Active ability Modify allies with +2 attack and +1 health.

name: Ravenhook
skill: Repossess ??? Condemn a random item equipped by the unit blocking ravenhook, get gold equal to the base cost of that item.

name: Rebel Decoy
skill: Distract Active ability Swap Rebel Decoy with another ally.

name: Savage Wolf
skill: Savage Wolf Reactive ability Modify Savage Wolf with +1 Attack and +2 Health after the combat phase.

name: Act of Defiance
effect: Modify allied creeps with +2 Attack and +1 Armor.

name: Assault Ladders
effect: Continuous effect Allies deal +2 damage when attacking a tower.

name: Berserker's Call
effect: Choose an allied red hero. It battles its enemy neighbours.

name: Coup de Grace
effect: Condemn a hero. Discard a random card.

name: Cunning Plan
effect: Swap a unit with one of its allied neighbours. Draw a card.

name: Eclipse
effect: Repeat one time for each charge: Deal 3 piercing damage to a random enemy.

name: Emissary of the Quorum
effect: Summon a Emissary of the Quorum.

name: Firestorm
effect: Reactive ability Deal 2 damage to each enemy before the action phase.

name: Frostbite
effect: Deal 2 damage to a unit and disarm it this round.

name: Grazing Shot
effect: Deal 2 damage to a unit in any lane.

name: New Orders
effect: Choose an ally. Choose a combat target for it.

name: Take Aim
effect: Give a red hero +4 Attack this round.

name: Thunder God's Wrath
effect: Deal 4 piercing damage to each enemy hero in all lanes.

name: Trebuchets
effect: Reactive ability Deal 2 piercing damage to the enemy tower before the action phase.

name: Apotheosis Blade
effect: Equipped hero has +8 Attack and +4 Siege. Condemn units equipped hero deals battle damage to.

name: Blade of the Vigil
effect: Equipped hero has +2 Attack and +2 Cleave.

name: Blink Dagger
effect: Passive Equipped hero has +2 attack. Active Move equipped hero to another lane.

name: Golden Ticket
effect: Get a random item from the Secret Shop.

name: Horn of the Alpha
effect: Passive Equipped hero has +4 health. Active Summon a Thunderhide Pack.

name: Keenfolk Plate
effect: Equipped hero has +1 armor. Equipped hero has +1 armor for each of its attackers.

name: Phase Boots
effect: Passive Equipped hero has +4 health Active Swap equipped hero with another ally.

name: Red Mist Maul
effect: Equipped hero has +2 attack and +5 siege.

name: Ristul Emblem
effect: Equipped hero has +4 Health and -2 Armor. The unit blocking equipped hero has -2 Armor.

name: Shield of Basilius
effect: Equipped hero has +2 Armor. Equipped hero's allied neighbors have +1 Armor.

name: Shop Deed
effect: Each item in your Secret Shop costs X less gold, where X is equal to its base costs.

name: Stonehall Cloak
effect: Equipped hero has +4 Health. Modify Stonehall Cloak with “Equipped hero has +2 Health” after the combat phase.

name: Stonehall Pike
effect: Equipped hero has +2 Attack. Modify Stonehall Pike with "Equipped hero has +1 Attack" after the combat phase.

name: Town Portal Scroll
effect: Return an allied hero to the fountain.

name: Vesture of the Tyrant
effect: Equipped hero has +3 armor and rapid deployment. Your tower has +3 armor.
